    • Method Detail

      • findByFilter

        java.lang.Iterable<Expense> findByFilter​(int userId,
                                         java.lang.String category,
                                         long startDate,
                                         long endDate)
        Get the expenses for a user filtered by a date interval
        Parameters:
        userId - id of the user the expenses belong to
        category - category of the expenses
        startDate - UNIX timestamp representing the start date of the interval
        endDate - UNIX timestamp representing the end date of the interval
        Returns:
        a collection containing the requested expenses

      • getTotalAmountByCategory

        java.util.Map<ExpenseCategory,​java.lang.Double> getTotalAmountByCategory​(User user,
                                                                               java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                                                               java.time.LocalDateTime end)
        Method for retrieving statistics regarding the total amount of expenses of a user by category within a time period
        Parameters:
        user - , the user the statistics are addressed to
        start - , the start of the considered time period
        end - , the end of the considered time period
        Returns:
        a Map containing, for each ExpenseCategory present, the total amount
